pageProduct.name: Promensil Menopause 90 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Promensil Menopause contains a natural standardised red clover isoflavone which can help relieve hot flushes & night sweats.

What is Promensil Menopause for?
Helps relieve menopausal symptoms, night sweats and hot flushes.

Who is Promensil Menopause for?
Women wanting support throughout menopause.

When should I take Promensil Menopause?
For the relief of menopausal symptoms.

Why should I take Promensil Menopause?
Promensil Menopause contains natural standardised red clover isoflavones. Promensil Menopause helps relieve menopausal symptoms, hot flushes and night sweats.
Help get your relief you need and start enjoying life with Promensil.

Size: 90 Tablets

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

Dosage Form: Film coated tablet
Quantity: 90 tablets
Active ingredients per tablet: Contains standardised extract equivalent to dried Trifolium pratense herb 2.5g (equiv. isoflavones 40g)

Active Ingredients: Trifolium pratense (Red Clover) herb ext. dry conc. std. 100 mg equiv. to herb dry 2.5 g (min) equiv. to Isoflavones (of Trifolium pratense) 40 mg per tablet

Directions

2 tablets daily with a meal.

USAGE ADVICE

One to two tablets daily with a meal. While individual responses vary, many women will notice difference in symptoms within 3-8 weeks of daily usage.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a dry place away from direct sunlight.
